replies.body: Don't let the Little Legend's cuteness distract you from the fact that aquiring them is lootbox mechanic and shouldn't be supported. Vote with your wallets!
its a free game, they need to make money
Through the abuse of gambling addicts and the obscuring of how much money you're spending to acquire said legends in several different ways?
Not to mention numerous courts and several entire countries have banned such practices outright for being predatory gambling.

Proposed US laws only prohibit loot boxes if the target audience is children, and the stuff in the loot boxes gives a competitive advantage.

As skins(and little legends) are purely cosmetic, they do not come in conflict with any current or proposed US Law.
Dude they're purely cosmetic. They don't affect the game at all. I wont be buying them either but you cant have everything.
I think OP is criticizing the loot box industry, not complaining they can't easily get what they want

Riot provides a completely free game that is awesome. I appreciate any way that they choose to make money because that money pays for my free game.

If loot boxes affected performance in game in any way I could see room for criticism, but League is a complete game without any money down at all.

In B4 the guy who says "So you're fine with child slave labor if it lets you get free stuff? >:("

Obviously, Islandcrater's statement is limited to ethical means. If you think there's something _morally_ wrong with the system that Riot has, then you'll have to explain why, because it's far from obvious to me and many others.

if riot or any company wants to sell cosmetics that is totally fine as long as there is an actual price tag attached to them, the stuff in loot boxes do not have actual price tags the thing you are looking for can pop out of the first box or maybe the 1000th.
I hope they make eggs for each species instead

Qiyana has had probably one of the least-hyped releases in a long while now; especially compared to prior champions, I've seen barely anything to promote her or excite people for her, because TFT is the same patch.

Probably because she doesn't really do anything groundbreaking like some of the releases recently. Ultimate Stealer, Champion Mimic, Summoner Spell Stealer, AD support assassin, etc. She's a very simple and easy-to-understand champion, and I don't think there's anything wrong with that at all. TFT is also another factor.

I agree with all of this, except that she's easy to understand. Even after watching a full gameplay I still left the video scratching my head a bit. When usually I can go "Okay glad I watched this first before playing". Even then I find myself WANTING to be excited, but can't find anything to be excited about her. Even her VO... and as someone who enjoys ALL the VOs in the game, new and old.

EDIT: I would also like to state that groundbreaking isn't always something that needs to be done. As Exil stated in a recent video :)
On the other hand, she's also introducing a new faction. Consider all the stuff that happened when Azir was released along with the new Shurima lore.

When Qiyana was teased, I honestly didn't cared at all because I was more entice into playing Mordekaiser. Even after his release, Qiyana just feels like nothing again because, yes, of TFT being teased.
So nothing about Tahm Kench's absurd damage? Like, auto win a lot of lanes base damage while being a tank? Really?
i rarely call champs broken, but tahm kench is just busted

Learning wave manipulation and how to play in ways that aren't just "fight my lane opponent 24/7 with zero focus on anything else I can ever do in the game" would probably help a _lot_ with that, considering he punishes those two things in particular, and only really functions if he does.

If you are playing any sort of squishy/high damage or bad early game toplane champ you will feed no matter what against Tahm. If you do any sort of burst damage, its meaningless because he heals all gray health if you don’t one shot him, and he shields if you even come close. Tahm kench is busted because a champ shouldn’t be both tanky and high damage. Tahms poke (Lick) is super annoying even if all your doing is csing, and he can walk up and swallow you if you are a melee champ. I don’t know or care if you think that its possible to learn to play against tahm, it probably is possible, but the issue is not if you can play against him. Its that he is broken. Which he is.
Nerf kench before you go nerfing pyke {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Rest in peace Pyke. All of your roles were killed in a single patch. It was nice knowing you.

Seriously though... my biggest problem is why did they have to remove the Q bonus damage? It felt good being able to play around "need more damage, try to get in range and short Q them, need CC, throw it for less damage".

Someone explain to me how is it that Karma and Sona are being nerfed because their winrates are too high but Lux remains untouched despite being the strongest support champ in the game?

Also Karma being nerfed immediately one patch after being buffed and getting a new skin. Coincidence? You be the judge...
Karma has a point and click tether, and a hasting shield. Sona has an aimbot Q, and a haste and heal. Lux may have good CC, but they're both skill shots. And her peel is much less reliable.

Sona burns a lot of mana casting it though and can be punished if casting it at a wrong time. Also that bomb thing lux has isnt really a skill shot cause I still get hit by the damn thing even after it misses me since it places a timed explosion in an area. Also the whole aftershock build path allows lux to stand in front of her enemies for a bit cast the root and proc that rune skill without having to use her bomb and ult yet

Sona's haste is a bit underwhelming as is, and her heals can be negated if someone has an item with grievous wounds. Also sona has a lot of counterpicks against her such as blitz, thresh, pyke, sivir, morgana, ziggs, ashe, Caitlyn, almost all junglers, Varus, anyone with stun immunity, anyone with iron locket of Solari, anyone with a spell shield or has items that grant spell shields, ap resistance champs or items, and the many mages who can outdamage  her. Oh and anyone who can silence her or cc her.
